price: Mi smo poslali Musaa, sa znamenjima Našim i dokazom jasnim,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
